pkgmetadata.longdescription: Effective Protein Structural Data Visualisation and Exploration // Collection of structural analysis tolls to compliment the research paper "Fi-score: a novel approach to characterise protein topology and aid in drug discovery studies" ;doi:10.1080/07391102.2020.1854859. 'Fiscore' package allows to explore and identify new topologically and functionally relevant structural features by applying integrated Gaussian Mixture Models.
